replies.body: a 45% reduction in jungle damage wont just slow sylas clears down it will completely stop them.
45% reduction, which applies to only the SECOND part of ONE of his abilities. That will hardly prevent jungling.

And the extra damage he takes from every camp surviving longer? that wont prevent him being competitive with other junglers? the increased clear time wont affect his jungling? 

AP junglers live or die by their clear speed and overall healthiness after said clear and he is not doing good enough compared to other ap junglers to justify this heavy handed nerf.
There are AP junglers in competitive?
Sejuani
Eeeehhhhh, I'd say she's more tank than AP personally
Really wish you reworked Honor. If you get a punishment and lose all your honor it disproportionately affects you late season compared to early season.
well then dont get punished???
4Head
The only people getting punished by honor are the ones that are super toxic in game.

Wrong, I was just punished because was in group of 4 premade who decided to troll and all report me. Never Cussed or said anything to them, Chat screen they sent showed just that. The report system is just bad.

no, ur literally wrong. the amount of reports doesn't make a difference. What you say makes a difference. the n word, f word, kys and others will get you instantly banned if reported. If you dont type anything and get reported then you wont be punished. It's an automatic ban system that looks what was said and ur score relative to the time in the game (to check if ur inting)

I don't know about that one. I was chat restricted for telling a Vi to "stop flaming our cho, and play the fucking game". Literally me saying that one time + asking cho to mute her a few times got me punished. It took a LONG time to get back to honor 3, but there is no chance of me getting Honor 5 by the end of the season.

I showed the chat logs to literally dozens of people (I used to stream, this happened on stream, and i read through the chat logs on stream), it was pretty unanimous that it was an unfair punishment. But, at the end of the day, it is what it is. I'm not upset about not getting honor 5 rewards, I'm just upset that the system can be abused by a toxic person that can talk the enemy into reporting someone in all chat.
WHY ARE YOU BUFFING JAX HE IS TOO FUCKIGN STRONG {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

49% wr in plat+
48% wr in Diamond+
47% wr in Master+

Yea, way too strong for sure. He is so good in fact that he loses more than he wins.
He still kinda wins a 1v1 against anyone, which is I think what he means.
If he's playing against a ranged champion you can easily bully him out of lane.
you mean those champions that only go toplane to bully melee toplaners?

> Shen could use a little more power when split-pushing in the mid-to-late game.


> Proceeds to buff damage only appliable to champions

Riot, guys, you don't even know what you are doing anymore. Stop. Get some help.
One of the main parts of split pushing is dueling, dude.

Shen's whole kit is built around dueling, dude.

his splitpushing is horrendous because of the fact that he has not pushing and waveclearing potential at all outside of items. Buffing his dueling potential just helps him in laning phase and teamfights, not splitpushing where literally anyone has the time to walk the entire map before Shen even has the time to get to a tower.

Split pushing isn't to take towers. It's to threaten to take towers so someone DOES walk. You know, 4 people on one side of the map, Shen on the other. Fight breaks out, even if the enemy top laner matching has tp, shen impacts the fight sooner. If Shen isn't a threat, or could even just be ran down, then his power to split push is meaningless.
Man that TK rework to make him so he no longer needs to be nerfed around pro-play seems to be working just as planned, right... right? hahaha "cries in support kench player"
so they took kench legs the other patch now the arms, prolly the tongue is next. HE. IS. UNPLAYABLE. NOW.
We're all crying, brother

No, jungle items require smite because they're the most gold-efficient items in the game for the stats they provide, but everyone taking smite is a bad idea.  It's to prevent things like toplaners taking cinderhulk constantly because of the bonus HP it gives.
When will kaylee rework drop?
Do you mean the Kayle rework that came out 5 months ago in patch 9.5?

No they teased another rework to change her from being a 40+ minute instawin champ to actually having to contribute early by giving her the tools to contribute early. Her ranged attacks were gonna be changed to lvl 6, AOE added at lvl 11 and then a dmg and range boost at lvl 16 instead of the true dmg.
I think they mean the mini-rework she's due for in 9.17
Dang Lux immediately gets a buff. I thought she was fine. Also Riven probably needs more nerfs because of how well she can abuse a bunch of items such as {{item:3812}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3161}} .

"We nerfed X because they are too strong in "pro" play" 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Eh. I think they should be smarter with these nerfs for sure, but they 100% should balance around pro play. Especially since they made the game team reliant, so solo queue is a mess anyways. Keep in mind, balancing things for Pro Play trickles down balance throughout the game. Maybe Darius is op in bronze, but it's more so because people aren't experienced enough to play against a champion like that. It's more a case of "learn/adapt" than a case of power. Nerfing him for low elo means he won't be used in any other elo. Which is the wrong thing to do.

They have been using extremely direct nerfs to champions that are played in pro play, even if they don't need them or can be dealt with in other ways. Sej is going to be played in organized play like Pro Play as long as she's passable because she offers a lot to a team as a tank jungler that has good ganks around the map AND offers cc. So she's going to need to be gutted in order to not see play. Which uh.... Is also the wrong thing to do. 

I personally don't have solutions, but Riot isn't doing a good job with this and it's pretty clear to see.

wukong changes pls
:/

_AP Ezreal's burst has made him a bit of a terror, so we're taking **some** power out of the build_

***cuts current AP ratio in half***

Jeez

AD ezreal builds AP items later game and is really common in pro so this hits that alot. AP ezreal mid builds lich and nashors, so you go from a 95% AP ratio to a 80% AP ratio. a ~16% decrease. So imo seems fine.

Feels bad, lost my Honor 5 a few months ago cause I said "I mean he's trash" in reference to a champion, that me and an opponent where chillfulling and clearfully discussing. But since my opponent laner was raging all game I'm sure he reported me and every one else out of spite and I got a few game chat restriction along with losing my honor for "trash"..........................
Sorry but that's a lie. That is not reportable, the report system wouldn't pick it up if that's all you said. Your ban was justified
That's not all you said, and its certainly not the first time you would have been reported.  You don't get multiple game chat restrictions for 1 sentence that is even directly addressing a player.

Yeah my friend, sadly this isn't true. Riot would really like for you to believe it is, but you can get a chat restriction and drop to 0 for one sentence in one game. It's pretty much based off how many reports in the game you get, 5 from the enemy team will usually get you some type of punishment and drop that honor level to 0.

Dude i curse a lot when talking about champs or events and in my 6 years of playing this game i have never been banned.

So you know what you did stop playing the victim.

I'm kind of tired of the frequency of the hextech skins... Like can you put the time and effort into more diverse skins? I know that this season is all about events and skinlines to match and stuff but like... Non event skins are good too :( yay for dragon oracle udyr i guess...
Bring back twisted treeline

twisted treeline is great. it's the fastest way to practice champions for top/mid roles to feel out champions. they just need to remove the timer on surrendering and the que dodge timer. like really?? 3v3 is so comp based if you get out picked you lose. no reason for these timers.
I don't think 2 seconds of cd is going to do much to riven's god status in masters.
she becomes easier to punish especially in lane
Buff Gnar
But he's unfun to play against, plus late game he has a tiny ult cooldown.

Gnar has a nice late game that makes him a fun champ to play but his early game can be easily exploited and is unfun to play as. I would love to see a change to gnar where they possibly nerf his late-game but in return give him some very needed early game buffs, such as lower cd's.
